text: Wayne Brightwell (born 2 December 1957) is a Canadian former wrestler who competed in the 1984 Summer Olympics. He was born in Sudbury, Ontario. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Greater Sudbury Category:Olympic wrestlers of Canada Category:Wrestlers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Canadian male sport wrestlers Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for Canada Category:Wrestlers at the 1986 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in wrestling
title: Wayne Brightwell
